translation.en: [man] If you're from the outside of the show world looking in,
translation.fr: Si vous ne connaissez pasles concours canins,

translation.en: everything that you see
makes you think that those people are crazy.
translation.fr: vous fait dire que ces gens sont fous.

translation.en: You know, the mannerisms, the quirks,
if you don't know anything about it, it looks ludicrous.
translation.fr: Si l'on n'y connaît rien,ça paraît ridicule.

translation.en: Once you get in it,
you realize that in the course of any given show weekend,
translation.fr: on comprend qu'au coursd'un week-end de concours,

translation.en: you will become those people at some point.
translation.fr: on finira par devenir comme ces gens.

translation.en: Every dog that's out there and handler
have been working for their lives, basically,
translation.fr: a pratiquement travaillé toute sa vie

translation.en: towards that moment.
[man] At this level of competition,
there's a lot of brutality,
there's a lot of talking behind the scenes.
translation.fr: Il y a beaucoup de discussionsen coulisses.

translation.en: For a guy like me to be at Westminster,
translation.fr: Qu'un homme comme moi soit au Westminster,

translation.en: it blows my mind.
[reporter] Just how important is the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show?
translation.fr: Le concours du Westminster Kennel Clubest important ?

translation.en: Kentucky Derby, Wimbledon, Muhammad Ali,
translation.fr: C'est le Kentucky Derby,Wimbledon, Mohamed Ali,

translation.en: it's the Super Bowl, it's the World Series, it's all of it.
translation.fr: le Super Bowl et la Série mondialeà la fois.

translation.en: This is as high as you go and as far as you go. This is the top.
translation.fr: C'est clairement le niveau le plus haut.

translation.en: [reporter] And you can imagine the hearts that are beating right now.
[announcer 1] Samantha, the English springer spaniel. [announcer 2] Oh, the pointer.
translation.fr: - Samantha, le springer anglais !- Le chien d'arrêt !

translation.en: A NETFLIX ORIGINAL SERIES
[man] Come here, girl. You want to go to the show?
translation.fr: Viens, ma puce. Tu veux y aller ?

translation.en: You want to go to the show?
You want to go for a road trip?
You do?
We've only been competing for two and a half years,
translation.fr: On ne concourtque depuis deux ans et demi.

translation.en: so this is our first chance at Westminster.
When we first start started, we researched breeds...
translation.fr: Au début, on s'est renseignés... PROPRIÉTAIRE, DRESSEUR

translation.en: and settled on the harrier.
It's a very rare breed.
We managed to convince a breeder
translation.fr: On a réussi à convaincre un éleveur

translation.en: to sell us one out of her litter.
translation.fr: de nous vendre l'un des bébés.

translation.en: [woman] She flew in three weeks later from Oregon to Miami.
translation.fr: Elle est arrivée d'Oregontrois semaines plus tard.

translation.en: Here she is!
Oh, my God!
-Look at that face. -[Mike] Oh, she's so adorable.
[woman] Oh, my God.
-They opened the gates and I was just-- -Here comes this crate being pushed down.
translation.fr: - La grille s'est ouverte et...- Sa caisse a été poussée vers nous.

translation.en: Yeah, that was incredible.
translation.fr: a été poussée vers nous. C'était fou.

translation.en: Uh-oh. There it is, the start.
The breeder said, "Consider showing."
translation.fr: L'éleveur a lancé l'idée des concours.

translation.en: We're like, "What? Show?"
We went to a show two weeks later.
translation.fr: On est allés en voir undeux semaines après.

translation.en: You know, we're like, "Wow, look at all this."
You know, I've never seen so many dogs in one place in my life.
translation.fr: Je n'avais jamais vuautant de chiens d'un coup.

translation.en: It was overwhelming.
So we're sitting there and people starting coming up and going,
translation.fr: On était assiset des gens venaient nous voir.

translation.en: "This is the most spectacular harrier we've seen in years,
translation.fr: "C'est le plus beau harrierqu'on ait vu depuis des années.

translation.en: look at the top line, look at the tail carriage."
translation.fr: Regardez son dos,la position de sa queue."

translation.en: "What? What are you talking about?"
We were like, "Huh?"
We had a great time that weekend.
Yeah, we had fun as a family
translation.fr: Oui, c'était un bon moment en famille.

translation.en: and decided to go to another show.
translation.fr: Du coup, on a décidé d'en faire un autre.

translation.en: [Phyllis] Emmy, this is happening!
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
[Mike] We're so new in this sport, that every ribbon, every rosette
translation.fr: On en est encore au début,donc chaque ruban et chaque cocarde

translation.en: is really special to us.
translation.fr: sont très importants à nos yeux.

translation.en: That's the result of getting out there,
almost every weekend.
Good girl.
You know, we have our dreams, but the dreams aren't focused on money.
translation.fr: On a des rêves, mais pas des rêves de richesse.

translation.en: Hey, calm down.
We don't have $10,000 budgets
translation.fr: On n'a pas un budget de 10 000 $

translation.en: every month, like a lot of the--
the top dogs and the top handlers have.
Come here, girl.
We...
are on a shoestring.
My suit for Westminster, we found at a thrift shop...

translation.en: for $5.
I'm not a 30-year-old who goes jogging in the morning
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un trentenairequi va courir le matin

translation.en: to stay in shape, to be able to run around a ring with a dog.
translation.fr: pour pouvoir courir sur le ringavec son chien,

translation.en: But I'm able to be competitive.
Up. Come on, up. Good.
Winning at Westminster, it is a life-changing thing.
translation.fr: Gagner Westminster, ça change une vie.

translation.en: If the stars align [laughs]
translation.fr: Si la chance est de notre côté,

translation.en: and it becomes like a dream or a Cinderella story,

translation.en: on Tuesday night.
We don't even have a hotel reserved for Tuesday night,
translation.fr: Nous n'avons même pas réservé d'hôtel.

translation.en: so we'll probably be sleeping in the street somewhere if that happens.
translation.fr: Nous allons sûrement devoirdormir dans la rue.

translation.en: The $5 suit.
All right.
The head in a boxer is so important,
translation.fr: La tête d'un boxer est primordiale.

translation.en: and in this dog, it's so beautiful.
All this in this dog, the neck,
the way the necks go into the shoulders
translation.fr: la courbe du cou vers ses épaules...

translation.en: is so beautiful.
So, I always try to keep him up.
That way, we can show that, on him.
I met him at a dog show.
translation.fr: Je l'ai rencontré à un concours.

translation.en: Let's say the truth,
-you saw me and you fell in love. -I actually really didn't like him at all.
translation.fr: - Tu as eu un coup de foudre.- Je ne l'aimais pas.

translation.en: -Through, in a way-- -You fell in love, say the truth.
I don't know, through the years, I maybe built a wall.
translation.fr: Au fils des années,j'ai peut-être construit un mur.

translation.en: It's just that I'm so concentrated what I'm doing,
translation.fr: Je suis tellement concentrésur mon activité

translation.en: that I forget to smile. [laughs]
I've been showing boxers and dobermans all my life
translation.fr: Je présente des boxers et des dobermansdepuis toujours

translation.en: in different countries,
different places.
I came to the US, because the US is the best place to do what we do.
translation.fr: Je suis venu aux États-Uniscar c'est le top pour notre activité.

translation.en: When you come from another country,
translation.fr: Quand on vient d'un autre pays,

translation.en: I think you have so much you want to prove
translation.fr: on veut prouver beaucoup de choses.

translation.en: that you're just as good as people here,
translation.fr: On veut montrerqu'on est comme les autres.

translation.en: and, you know, you have to work ten times harder
translation.fr: Il faut bosser dix fois plus.

translation.en: and you want to prove yourself.
[Allison] As professional handlers,
we have a lot of dogs living with us.
There are nice things about each one of 'em,
but it's not often that you have a dog this special.
translation.fr: Ils ont tous leurs qualités, mais un chien aussi particulier est rare.

translation.en: This is Thor, our pet.
Sophia's guard.
translation.fr: Le garde du corps de Sophia.

translation.en: Beside a show dog, he's our friend, he's everything for us.
translation.fr: C'est un compétiteur,mais aussi notre ami, notre vie entière.

translation.en: You build a relationship every day.
translation.fr: Une relation se construit chaque jour.

translation.en: They get to love you, and you get to love them.
translation.fr: Il apprend à vous aimer,et réciproquement.

translation.en: I will miss him. I will miss showing him.
translation.fr: Ça va me manquer de ne plus le présenter.

translation.en: [Allison] Tomorrow, we're gonna leave for Westminster.
You go to New York, the big city,
translation.fr: C'est à New York, une ville immense.

translation.en: you go to the Madison Square Garden.
The first time I got there, I was like, "Whoa.
Whoa."
When you see the Empire State with the lights,
with the color of Westminster, I couldn't believe.
translation.fr: aux couleurs du concours.Je n'y croyais pas.

translation.en: And now let's give a round of applause for the 15th annual New York Pet Fashion Show.

translation.en: Her name is Gia,
and she has her own couture line, which is called Gia Diamond Couture.

and he's a Rhinestone cowboy today,

And these outfits were fashioned after
the Dolce and Gabbana Blue Jean Wedding Collection.

translation.en: This is the 142nd year of Westminster.
All the 50 states are represented at the show.
You know, more than ten countries are here.

translation.fr: Nous avons hérité d'un bâtimentde 23 000 mètres carrés complètement vide.

how many details there are in putting the show on.

translation.en: and it's gonna be so much fun.
The Westminster Dog Show begins with 2,800 dogs at the Piers.
translation.fr: Le concours de Westminsterdébute avec 2 800 chiens... ...au Piers.

translation.en: We start with breed competitions.
translation.fr: Ils sont d'abord sélectionnés par race.

translation.en: Later that night at Madison Square Garden,
the winners of those best of breed competitions will then move on
translation.fr: les gagnants des épreuves par race disputent les épreuves par groupe.

translation.en: to the groups.
The seven group winners end up in the Best in Show Ring.
translation.fr: Les sept gagnants concourentpour le prix "Best in Show".

translation.en: The Best in Show winner is then America's dog for the next year.
translation.fr: Le vainqueur est la mascotte du payspendant un an.

translation.en: Let's go.
Oh, here we go.
I'm called the voice of Westminster.
My job is to represent the club.
I take the role very seriously, because I grew up showing dogs
translation.fr: Je prends mon rôle très au sérieux. J'ai toujours présenté des chiens.

translation.en: and I've been part of the sport my entire life.
My parents were breeders. My mother was also a judge,
translation.fr: Mes parents étaient éleveurs.Ma mère était aussi juge.

translation.en: and I want to represent those people properly.
We're heading to Nasdaq,
and we'll do the closing bell ceremony.
The exhibitors that are already in the city are bringing their dogs,
translation.fr: Les exposants déjà sur placevont amener leur chien.

translation.en: and they're gonna join us and help promote the sport and promote the show.

[woman] Great.

it's something I've done my entire life.

translation.en: Betty-Anne is our best in show judge, she's been at Westminster 11 times.
translation.fr: Betty-Anne juge la dernière épreuve. C'est sa 11e fois au Westminster.

translation.en: We're very proud of the fact that we picked top flight judges,
translation.fr: Nous sommes très fiersd'avoir des juges de haut vol,

translation.en: who are thought of as insightful and fair and experienced.
translation.fr: qui sont considérés comme avisés,justes et chevronnés.

translation.en: When it finally gets to me, the seven best dogs will be in the ring.
translation.fr: Lorsque c'est mon tour, j'ai affaire aux sept meilleurs chiens.

translation.en: It's my pleasure to find the one I like best.
translation.fr: C'est un bonheurd'identifier celui que je préfère.

translation.en: When we judge dogs, you are bringing your own background to the sport,
translation.fr: Lorsque l'on juge,on apporte sa propre expérience.

translation.en: so you can have a slightly different take than somebody else
translation.fr: C'est pourquoi les avispeuvent un peu diverger.

translation.en: and it doesn't mean they're wrong and I'm right.
It is very subjective.
We judge on how good a representative of their breed they are.
translation.fr: Nous voulons la meilleurereprésentation possible d'une race.

translation.en: Each breed has a standard
and that standard describes
the perfect dog in that breed.
The length of the head, what the coat should feel like,
translation.fr: La longueur de la tête,la douceur de la robe,

translation.en: how the dog should move.
When a judge walks into the ring,
translation.fr: Lorsqu'un juge entre dans le ring,

translation.en: they are measuring the dogs they are looking at,
against that ideal standard.
The best one,
you win best of breed.
translation.fr: est le meilleur de sa race.

translation.en: So once you've done that, then you compete in a group.
translation.fr: Une fois qu'il a gagné, il fait l'épreuve de groupe.

translation.en: There are seven groups,
hound, sporting, herding, non-sporting,
translation.fr: Chiens de chasse, de sport, de berger, de compagnie,

translation.en: toy, terrier, and working.
translation.fr: toys, terriers et chiens de travail.

translation.en: The group judge comes in.
What they're trying to assess is which one is closest to perfection
translation.fr: Il tente d'identifier le chien qui est le plus proche de la perfectionselon son standard idéal.

translation.en: against their ideal standard.
translation.fr: qui est le plus proche de la perfectionselon son standard idéal.

translation.en: So, once they pick that winner in the groups,
translation.fr: Une foisque le lauréat du groupe est choisi,

translation.en: the heaviest burden is on the Best in Show judge.
translation.fr: le fardeau revient au dernier juge.

translation.en: That judge has to have the kind of experience evaluating
translation.fr: Le juge du "Best in Show"doit avoir évalué

translation.en: many, many breeds for many, many years.
translation.fr: beaucoup de races pendant des années.

translation.en: The devil is in the details.
And then we want a performance,
whoever has got that little extra bit of pizzazz and says, "I'll be the one."
translation.fr: On veut un lauréat qui a un peu de panache et qui dit : "Ce sera moi."

translation.en: [man 1] Beautiful dog!
-How about that? [laughs] -[man 2] I'll take the ribbon.

They're realizing that dogs just fill a hole.

translation.fr: Il s'agit de la cinquième édition

translation.en: And I say, "What a beautiful puppy."
I went to a handler that I used to work for, Esteban Farias,

Happy.

everything that you would want in a companion dog.

translation.en: And that's what this show is all about.
She's got this expression.
As the judge is walking up, all on her own,
translation.fr: Lorsqu'un juge s'avance, de son propre chef,

translation.en: she sees it out of the corner of her eye and does...
translation.fr: elle le fixe du coin de l’œil et se tourne...

translation.en: that to the judge, consistently.
translation.fr: Elle ne quitte plus le juge des yeux.

translation.en: What she's doing is she's locking eyes with that judge
translation.fr: En fait, elle crée un contact visuelavec le juge

translation.en: and going, "Pick me."
It's like, "Look at me."
We're going to the Garden.
translation.fr: On va au Madison Square Garden.

translation.en: We're going to the Garden.
translation.fr: On va au Madison Square Garden.

translation.en: My dog just took Best of Breed and is going to be at Madison Square Garden.
translation.fr: Mon chien a remporté un prixet va aller au Madison Square Garden.

translation.en: [Mike] Well, that was intense,
even the judge after we won breed
translation.fr: Même le juge, après notre victoire,

translation.en: patted me on the shoulder and said, "Just breathe."
A guy like me,
I'm middle aged, out of shape,
don't have tons of money,
translation.fr: qui ne roule pas sur l'or.

translation.en: but because of her,
because of Emmy,
I walk into the ring on equal footing,
translation.fr: je suis sur un pied d'égalité

translation.en: with everybody else in there and...
translation.fr: avec les autres sur le ring. Et...

translation.en: because of her...
my life has completely changed.
Twenty minutes.
Be back!
[Esteban Farias] My last pug last year,
translation.fr: Mon dernier carlin, c'était l'an dernier.

translation.en: when I was walking with him,
he suddenly dropped dead.
I mean, I don't--
I have no words for that.
I mean, Biggie came to our house to fill that hole.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas de mots. Biggie est arrivé chez nouspour combler... ce vide.

translation.en: I should be at dinner with my wife right now,
translation.fr: Je devrais être avec ma femme,

translation.en: but I came to support Esteban. [laughs]
translation.fr: mais je suis venu soutenir Esteban.

translation.en: Hi, pug.
It's so exciting to see what is gonna happen, you know.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte de voir ce qui va se passer.

translation.en: [woman] Oh, my God, there he is!
[man over PA] May we have the Toy Group in the ring, please?
translation.fr: Le groupe des toys sur le ring,s'il vous plaît.

translation.en: [Gail] This is a wonderful group.
translation.fr: C'est un superbe groupe très varié,

translation.en: It adds such variety from the Affenpinscher's monkey face,
translation.fr: C'est un superbe groupe très varié, qui va de l'affenpinscher

translation.en: to the flowing, perfect white coat of the Maltese,
translation.fr: à la robe blanche parfaitedu bichon maltais.

translation.en: this is such a fun, upbeat little group of companions.
translation.fr: C'est un petit groupede compagnons drôles et joyeux.

translation.en: Esteban Farias is showing Biggie tonight.
translation.fr: Esteban Farias va présenter Biggiece soir.

translation.en: [man] Yeah, this is a heartfelt moment,
when you see Biggie coming out onto the floor.
translation.fr: de voir Biggie sur le ring.

translation.en: [man over PA] Puggy confidence with a friendly, sensitive and sincere nature.
translation.fr: Une assurance doublée d'une natureamicale, sensible et sincère.

translation.en: This is pug number 15.
[man] David Kirkland will size up the 23 and name the winner of the Toy Group.
translation.fr: David Kirkland va évaluer les 23et désigner le meilleur toy du groupe.

translation.en: [Gail] You have Emmitt, the Affenpinscher,
Newton, Brussels Griffon,
Sunito.
Pekingese.
[Gail] Pug, Biggie made it.
[man] One last look, before he makes his selection.
translation.fr: Un dernier regard avant le choix final.

translation.en: [David] Start with the pug.
[Gail] Here we go.
Looks like Biggie's been pulled out,
of course, a crowd favorite, the pug breed.
2018 Toy Group winner is the pug.
Second, third and fourth.
[Gail] Biggie has won the Toy Group.
[man] The emotional family story continues.
[man 2] Yes, absolutely.
Oh, my God, this is unbelievable.
This is a dream come true.
And I have a little friend who is looking for us, up in the sky,
translation.fr: Et... J'ai un petit compagnonqui nous regarde de là-haut,

translation.en: and this is for him.
Absolutely, congratulations again
and get him ready to win tomorrow, Best in Show.
translation.fr: Qu'il se prépare pour gagner demain.

translation.en: It's a madhouse.
Starting to get hot in here.
There are thousands of people walking by.
translation.fr: Il y a des milliers de visiteurs.

translation.en: We're one day out, and should she win the hound group,
translation.fr: On est à J-1. Si elle gagne le prix du chien de chasse,

translation.en: she'll be competing in Best in Show tomorrow night,
translation.fr: elle concourra pour le "Best in Show"demain soir

translation.en: along with representatives from all the other groups.
translation.fr: avec les représentantsde tous les autres groupes.

translation.en: We will be competing against the best of the best.
translation.fr: Nous nous retrouverons face aux meilleurs.

translation.en: But you know something, under the right judge,
translation.fr: Mais vous savez, avec le bon juge,

translation.en: Emmy, if she's on,
she has just as much of a chance at winning that group,
translation.fr: elle a autant de chances de gagner

translation.en: as any other dog.
translation.fr: que les autres. CHIENS DE CHASSE

translation.en: -[man over PA] We have the hound group. -[audience cheering]
[man] Right here we have the first hound.
translation.fr: Voici le premier chien de chasse.

translation.en: This is a great example of the Afghan.
translation.fr: Le lévrier afghan est un bon exemple.

translation.en: You see the prominent hip bones.
That's actually not a skinny dog. That's a trait of the breed.
translation.fr: Il a des hanches saillantes. Il n'est pas mince,ce qui est typique de sa race.

translation.en: [Gail] This is Emmy, owned by Mike Gowen. That's Champion Blythmoor's Jump at the Chance.
translation.fr: Voici Mike Gowan et Emmy, nom de code"Champion Blythmoors Saisis ta Chance".

translation.en: -[Mike] Let's go. -[Gail] She is Mike's very first show dog.
translation.fr: - C'est parti.- C'est son premier chien de concours.

translation.en: [Mike] All right.
[Gail] Isn't this incredible?
Not everyone has a best of breed winner
translation.fr: Emmy a déjà gagné une épreuve.

translation.en: -as their first show dog. -[man] That's right.
[Mike] Good girl. Ready?
Right here.
Stand still.
Yes, sir.
[man] Our hound group, rounded out.
translation.fr: Tout le groupe a été évalué.

translation.en: -[Gail] These are his selects. -Bloodhound.
-[Gail] He has the basset... -Borzoi.
beagle, bloodhound, borzoi Lucy.
-[Gail] Long-haired dachshund. -Wire.
translation.fr: - Le teckel à poil long.- Fox-terrier.

translation.en: And the the wire-haired.
translation.fr: Et le fox-terrier à poil dur.

translation.en: [Mike] Dachshund, borzoi, basset.
-[judge] Thank you. Thank you. -[Mike] Wait a minute. [man] He's making his final cut.
[judge] Okay, let's back up, please.
[man] As we said, it's on the day,
and today, the judge chose another dog.
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, le jugea choisi un autre chien.

translation.en: And the winner of the hound group will be the borzoi. Lucy!
translation.fr: Le lauréat des chiens de chasseest le barzoï, Lucy.

translation.en: [Gail] Lucy does it again.
[man] Lucy, Lucy!
-Congratulations, Valerie. -Thank you.
[Mike] That was amazing.
We didn't place in group, we didn't win the group,
translation.fr: On n'a pas gagné l'épreuve de groupe.

translation.en: so our road to Westminster ends now.
translation.fr: Notre route vers Westminster s'arrête ici.

translation.en: And our next one starts tomorrow.
We know the borzoi. She's magnificent.
translation.fr: On connaît le barzoï, il est sublime.

translation.en: That was not a surprise. That's well-deserved.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas étonnant. C'est mérité.

translation.en: That's...
an incredible bitch.
I know that she--
I'm gonna leave with the best dog in this show.
translation.fr: Je repars avec le meilleur chien.

translation.en: Period.
You know, it's a dog show.
You win some, you lose some.
translation.fr: On gagne, on perd.Il a gagné deux ans d'affilée

translation.en: He won Best of Breed two years in a row, which we're over the moon about.
translation.fr: On gagne, on perd.Il a gagné deux ans d'affilée et nous étions ravies.

translation.en: And my theory is,
there are a lot more judges outside the ring than inside the ring.
translation.fr: qu'il y a plus de jugesen dehors du ring que dedans.

translation.en: [Bartlett] Yes, it's a competition, but in the end,
translation.fr: C'est un concours, mais au final,

translation.en: it's about the friendships. It's about everybody being able to stick together
translation.fr: c'est l'amitié qui compte, et le fait d'assouvir notre passionensemble.

translation.en: for the thing that we all love to do.
translation.fr: et le fait d'assouvir notre passionensemble.

translation.en: I mentioned this is what we do for fun, right? [laughs]
translation.fr: J'ai dit qu'on était làpour s'amuser, non ?

translation.en: -[man] All lovely dogs. -[Gail] You have a ring full
translation.fr: - Qu'ils sont beaux !- Le ring est rempli...

translation.en: of incredible animals out there,
all wonderful examples of their breed.
translation.fr: tous de glorieux exemples de leur race.

translation.en: This is Flynn, being handled by Bill McFadden.
translation.fr: Voici Flynn et son maître Bill McFadden.

translation.en: [woman] The bichon, please.
[Gail] Flynn, the bichon, has won!
-[man] Wow! -[Gail] Non-Sporting Group.
[man] Flynn, rounding out the night,
and in position for tomorrow night's
translation.fr: et se prépare à demain soir

translation.en: 2018 crowning of Best in Show.
-What is his win record? -His win record,
last year, he won 116 group firsts and 41 best in shows.
translation.fr: L'année dernière, 116 épreuves de groupeet 41 "Best in Show".

translation.en: And...
And, you know, sometimes all they have to do is lift one eyebrow and--
translation.fr: Parfois, il leur suffitde lever un sourcil.

translation.en: [woman] Biggie! Biggie!
You work all your life
to come to this stage and win something like this,
you know, and have the support from each other like this is unbelievable.
translation.fr: Recevoir un si grand soutien, c'est incroyable.

translation.en: We are family, and this is so important. This is a big show.
translation.fr: On est une famille.C'est important, c'est un gros concours.

translation.en: Those are Esteban's kids.
Say to mommy, "We won.
translation.fr: Dis à maman qu'on a gagné.

translation.en: Biggie won."
Yeah, yes.
We should get going, Hernan.
Oh, my God. Oh, my God!
-[woman laughing] -Oh, my God!
[woman] You did it!
Today is Tuesday, it's the final day of the show.
translation.fr: C'est mardi, le dernier jour du concours.

translation.en: During the day at Piers, we finish Best of Breed.
translation.fr: La journée, au Piers, on termine les épreuves par race.

translation.en: Tonight, the final three groups compete at the Garden
translation.fr: Ce soir seront jugésles trois derniers groupes.

translation.en: and then Best in Show.
translation.fr: Puis ce sera le Best in Show.

translation.en: When you watch the entrants coming in,
translation.fr: Au moment où les concurrents arrivent,

translation.en: you can look on their faces
and see the hope they have that maybe they're gonna win today.
It's exhilarating.
-Mom, Mom, watch your face. -Oh.
-Did you eat? -I got something, yeah.
I'm starving.
[Kerry] When Hernan came to the country,
translation.fr: Quand Hernan est arrivé dans ce pays,

translation.en: he came to this country with not even a cellphone.
translation.fr: il n'avait même pas de téléphone.

translation.en: He's going against handlers
that have been doing this a hell of a lot longer.
translation.fr: qui sont bien plus expérimentés que lui.

translation.en: He's just a kid that came here with a passion
translation.fr: C'est un gamin qui a une passion

translation.en: and a belief in the dog he's showing.
translation.fr: et qui croit en son chien.

translation.en: This would be a dream to come to this country
translation.fr: Ce serait formidabled'être venu dans ce pays

translation.en: and win a breed.
[woman] Can I please have number seven?
Number eight.
Number nine.
Number ten. Number 14.
translation.fr: Numéro 10. Numéro 14. ÉPREUVE PAR RACE : BOXER

translation.en: [Kerry] If you have so much on you--
translation.fr: Beaucoup de gens comptent sur vous.

translation.en: You have the owner, you have people that are depending on you,
translation.fr: Le propriétaire,ceux qui dépendent de vous,

translation.en: your wife, your dog in itself--
If you get nervous, you could throw the dog off.
translation.fr: Si vous stressez, le chien sera troublé.

translation.en: It's like a dance team, you know, if one person's not dancing,
translation.fr: C'est comme une chorégraphie. Si un danseur refuse de danser,

translation.en: you're probably not winning as a team.
But if you're in sync
and you work together and you move together and everything's right on,
translation.fr: vous avez travaillé ensembleet vous assurez,

translation.en: the judge is gonna see it.
[Hernan] Always, always.
It's about my dog and me, my connection.
translation.fr: Tout repose sur le chien et moi. Sur notre relation.

translation.en: It's the first time for me winning a breed.
We work for this, you know,
we work for this.
We come from so far away, dreaming with this.
translation.fr: On vient de très loin. On en rêvait.

translation.en: So we go into the group and see what happens, you know.
translation.fr: On verra ce qui se passeraà l'épreuve de groupe.

translation.en: I gotta go get my tuxedo now.
[Bill] Last night, my little white fluffball
translation.fr: Hier, ma petite boule de poils blanche

translation.en: won the Non-Sporting Group,
and we're waiting to do Best in Show.
So, I've been in the Best in Show ring a few times.
I've won once,
so it's kind of like Meryl Streep, gets nominated frequently.
translation.fr: C'est un peu comme Meryl Streepqui est toujours nommée.

translation.en: I've been to the doggy Oscars a few times.
translation.fr: Les Oscars canins, je connais un peu.

translation.en: Tonight, the Best in Show judge, Betty-Anne Stenmark
translation.fr: Ce soir, notre juge est Betty-Anne Stenmark,

translation.en: is one of our great ladies in our sport,
and I just know, whatever she falls in love with tonight
translation.fr: Le chien sur lequel elle craquera

translation.en: is what's gonna go Best in Show.
[Betty-Anne] There's only one Best in Show.
It's the pinnacle of our sport.
And I want to do a good job.
translation.fr: Je veux faire du bon travail.

translation.en: I'm so excited for you, I really am. Oh, I'm so happy for you.
translation.fr: Je suis ravie pour toi. Vraiment. Je suis trop contente.

translation.en: Who would ever have thought?
[Allison] Because my husband forgot his tuxedo.
translation.fr: Mon mari a oublié son smoking.

translation.en: 'Cause I just sprinted to Macy's, asked them,
"Whatever tuxedo you have in this size, just give it to me right now."
translation.fr: et j'ai demandén'importe quel smoking à sa taille.

translation.en: And I grabbed him a specific pink bow tie that he wanted.
translation.fr: Il voulait aussi un modèle précisde nœud papillon rose.

translation.en: With this dog especially,
he gets so intense
and I see Thor's personality build up more.
translation.fr: que je vois le caractère de Thorévoluer.

translation.en: [Hernan] I will only show Thor one more time.
translation.fr: Ce sera le dernier concours de Thor.

translation.en: This will be last time for him at Westminster,
translation.fr: Il concourra une dernière foisau Westminster,

translation.en: never again.
[man over PA] May we have the Working Group in the ring, please?
translation.fr: Le groupe des chiens de travail,s'il vous plaît !

translation.en: [man] 29 entries, boxers have the most working group wins and placements
translation.fr: Vingt-neuf concurrents.Les boxers ont souvent de bons résultats.

translation.en: Best in Show 15 times, have come from this group.
translation.fr: Quinze d'entre euxont remporté le concours.

translation.en: [man over PA] The boxer is fearless, highly intelligent and happy.
translation.fr: Un boxer est courageux,très intelligent et enjoué.

translation.en: Originally bred to run down and hold down wild boar and bear,
translation.fr: Historiquement, il fut élevé pour contrerles sangliers et les ours.

translation.en: he's not a dog for the timid and can be protective when called upon.
translation.fr: Il n'est pas pour les craintifset peut se montrer protecteur.

translation.en: Extremely intuitive, he is at all times responsive to his owner's moods
translation.fr: D'une intuition innée, il s'adapteaux humeurs de son maître.

translation.en: and is a fine alert companion dog for any family.
translation.fr: C'est un compagnon vigilantenvers sa famille.

translation.en: This is boxer number ten.
[Gail] They're very athletic, smooth and graceful.
translation.fr: Ils sont très athlétiques,lisses et gracieux.

translation.en: -[man] The boxer-- -[Gail] Here we go.
Just... that camera's--
[man] That's a robotic camera, so...
he's probably wondering where the camera operator is, it's a union shop.
translation.fr: Il se demande sûrementoù est le cameraman.

translation.en: [man 2] Well, we train our dogs for a lot of things, but not robots.
translation.fr: On n'entraîne pas nos chiensavec des robots.

translation.en: [man 2] They got back together right away, that's great.
translation.fr: Ils se sont vite replacés, c'est bien.

translation.en: [Gail] You see the dog comes back to the judge.
translation.fr: Le chien revient vers le juge.

translation.en: He's throwing the bait to try and get the dog's ears up.
translation.fr: Il doit lever les oreillesà la vue du leurre.

translation.en: [man] Now, does that work against the judging, that incident?
translation.fr: Ça lui portera préjudice, le couac du début ?

translation.en: -[Gail] Oh, no. -[man] No, okay.
[man in audience] Come on, judge, don't be shy!
translation.fr: Monsieur le juge, n'ayez pas peur !

translation.en: [man 2] Mr. Slay is coming down the line right now.
translation.fr: M. Slay se dirige vers la ligne.

translation.en: It's a daunting task with all the different types in here.
translation.fr: C'est compliqué.Les chiens sont très différents.

translation.en: [Gail] You know, big numbers here in this group.
translation.fr: Il y a du lourd, dans ce groupe.

translation.en: [man 2] And the giant schnauzer.
[Gail] Ty, the number one dog in the country.
translation.fr: Ty, le chien numéro 1 de notre pays.

translation.en: [Gail laughs] Monet!
-And the Siberian Husky. -[Slay] Back 'em right up, please.
translation.fr: - Le husky de Sibérie.- Faites-les reculer.

translation.en: [man 2] And we hear the crowd reacting.
Some of them are happy, and some wanted a different dog out there.
translation.fr: Certains se réjouissentet d'autres sont déçus.

translation.en: [man in audience] We still love you, big guy!
translation.fr: Je t'aime quand même, mon grand !

translation.en: The giant schnauzer is number one.
[man] And Ty takes it.
Our sixth group winner, Ty taking the Working Group.
translation.fr: Voici le sixième gagnant. Ty pour les chiens de travail.

translation.en: [Gail laughs] He's very excited.
[man] And tough competition for Ty to survive a pack
translation.fr: La compétition fut rude pour Ty.

translation.en: -of very, very impressive dogs. -[Gail] Very tough group.
translation.fr: - Le groupe était très impressionnant.- En effet.

translation.en: Very tough group, a lot of top dogs out there.
We said, "The camera!"
And the dog goes like this: truh!
[speaks English] Oh, no!
But it's all right.
We will forgive you this time around.
translation.fr: On te pardonne pour cette fois.

translation.en: [Hernan] I wanna start crying, just to think about it.
translation.fr: J'ai envie de pleurer rien qu'en y pensant.

translation.en: I will miss showing him.
translation.fr: Ça me manquera de le montrer,

translation.en: I will miss just seeing his face,
I will miss...
Thor giving me his heart every time we walk in the ring.
translation.fr: de le sentir me donner son cœurune fois dans le ring.

translation.en: [Betty-Anne] It's electrifying.
It always is electrifying in the Garden, but it can be quite daunting.
translation.fr: L'expérience est toujours palpitante, mais assez intimidante.

translation.en: Give Biggie a kiss.
[man over PA] Introducing the seven group winners competing for Best in Show
translation.fr: Voici les sept gagnants qui s'affrontentpour le titre de Best in Show

translation.en: at the 142nd Westminster Dog Show.
The winner of the Herding Group,
translation.fr: Le lauréat des chiens de bergers,

translation.en: border collie.
The winner of the Hound Group, borzoi.
translation.fr: Le lauréat des chiens de chasse, le barzoï.

translation.en: The winner of the Working Group, giant schnauzer.
translation.fr: Le lauréat des chiens de travail,le schnauzer géant.

translation.en: The winner of the Non-Sporting Group, bichon frise.
translation.fr: Le lauréat des chiens de compagnie,le bichon frisé.

translation.en: The winner of the Toy Group, pug.
translation.fr: Le lauréat des toys, le carlin.

translation.en: [man] Betty-Anne Stenmark sizing them up. The borzoi has never won Best in Show.
translation.fr: Betty-Anne Stenmark les évalue.Le barzoï n'a jamais gagné ce titre.

translation.en: Same for giant schnauzer and for Norfolk terrier.
translation.fr: Le schnauzer géantet le norfolk terrier non plus.

translation.en: Could one of them break through?
[Betty-Anne] Love the borzoi bitch, she's beautiful.
Giant schnauzer is a magnificent dog.
translation.fr: Le schnauzer géantest un chien magnifique.

translation.en: He has a really good hard coat on him and beautifully presented.
translation.fr: Il a une très belle robe dense,et est joliment présenté.

translation.en: The Sussex, a wonderful little dog.
translation.fr: Le sussex est un merveilleux petit chien.

translation.en: That bichon has that little extra something and went,
translation.fr: Le bichon, c'est comme s'il m'avait dit :

translation.en: "Oh, lady, I'm really doing it for you tonight."
translation.fr: "D'accord. Je sors le grand jeu pour toi."

translation.en: The pug's a very seasoned little exhibitor out there.
translation.fr: Le carlin est un petit concurrenttrès expérimenté.

translation.en: He will have a lovely future.
It's not a difficult job, because at that point, they are really good dogs.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une tâche difficile,car les chiens sont tous beaux.

translation.en: And it becomes show time,
translation.fr: Au fur et à mesure, le spectacle prend corps et la foule crie.

translation.en: and all those people and all those noises,
translation.fr: le spectacle prend corps et la foule crie.

translation.en: there will be a dog who is demanding to be looked at,
translation.fr: L'un des chiens va exiger d'être regardé.

translation.en: who can look down its nose at you and say, "You will be putting me up,
translation.fr: Il sera capable de fixer son regardet de dire : "Choisis-moi,

translation.en: because I am the king or the queen today."
translation.fr: car c'est moi le roi ou la reine du jour."

translation.en: [Gail] She's made her decision.
[man] The tension.
Best in Show will be the bichon frise. Flynn!
translation.fr: Le Best in Show... est le bichon frisé. Flynn.

translation.en: [Gail] Flynn wins Best in Show.
[man] Upsetting the number one rated dog coming in
translation.fr: Il ravit la victoire au chien numéro unet à d'autres chiens populaires,

translation.en: and a couple of other popular dogs, like Biggie.
translation.fr: Il ravit la victoire au chien numéro unet à d'autres chiens populaires, comme Biggie.

translation.en: [man 2] It just shows, you never know who's gonna win at Westminster.
translation.fr: C'est la preuvequ'on ne sait jamais qui va gagner.

translation.en: [woman] Bill, congratulations.
translation.fr: Bill, félicitations.C'est bien sûr le rêve de tout dresseur

translation.en: It is obviously every handler's dream to win at Westminster.
translation.fr: Bill, félicitations.C'est bien sûr le rêve de tout dresseur de gagner ici.Comment vous sentez-vous ?

translation.en: What does it feel like?
Well, it feels a little unreal
translation.fr: Je n'arrive pas vraiment à y croire.

translation.en: and...
it's just magical, you know.
[Esteban] This is what we do for a living,
but I think the dogs are more important than money,
translation.fr: mais, pour moi... Les chiens importent plus que l'argent.

translation.en: They're animals, you know.
They are dogs that we take care and they take care of us.
translation.fr: Ce sont des animaux. On s'occupe d'eux, ils s'occupent de nous.

translation.en: The dogs take care as our family.
The common thread is that it's about community.
translation.fr: Le fil conducteur,c'est l'esprit de communauté.

translation.en: It is a good feeling to know that other dog people are there to help.
translation.fr: C'est rassurant de savoirqu'on peut s'entraider entre dresseurs.

translation.en: That's something our sport can be very proud of,
translation.fr: Nous pouvons être fiers de notre activité,

translation.en: is that we do help each other.
We're a family, definitely.
Might be a little quirky, we're a quirky family.
I think anybody that's out there, you should go home,
translation.fr: Je pense qu'on devrait tous rentrer chez nous

translation.en: give your dog a hug, because dogs are amazing, they make your life better.
translation.fr: et embrasser notre chien.Les chiens rendent la vie plus belle.

translation.en: Just spend a minute, look in their eyes
translation.fr: Regardez-les une minute dans les yeux.

translation.en: and if that isn't a connection, I don't know what is.
translation.fr: Si ça, ce n'est pas une connexion, j'ignore ce que c'est.

translation.en: You ready? ¡Vamos!
